com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.plan

Interface PlanCoordinator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Observable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPlanCoordinator

    public interface PlanCoordinator
extends Observable
    PlanCoordinator's job is to coordinate offers among configured PlanManagers. A PlanCoordinator is an Observer. It either has operations to perform or it doesn't, and it updates its observers when this state changes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      boolean hasOperations()

      Provides offers to each PlanManager for processing.

        java.util.Collection<Protos.OfferID> processOffers(SchedulerDriver driver,

        Provides offers to each PlanManager for processing. Keeps tracks of dirtied offers and assets.

        List of OfferID's that were used for scheduling operations.
